version_description:
- Improved Design! (You can change to the previous design from 'Themes')
- Customize Bar color
- Language change option

- Improved Design! (You can change to the previous design from 'Themes')
- Customize Bar color
- Language change option
- Guide for current users
- Now you can adjust the blur amount of the background
- Date calculation fix

- Widget fix
- Crash fix

- Support iOS9
- Optimize for 5 inch, 5.7 inch screens

- Support iOS9
- Optimize for 5 inch, 5.7 inch screens

[To Updated Users]
If you cannot see the contents,
Please select 'any theme' from the theme settings.
There is some bug with the text color settings.
Sorry for the problem.

- New Theme!
- Optimized to iOS 10

- Fixed crash on chinese devices.
- Sorry about the theme bug, please change the theme or change text color
- New Theme!
- Optimized to iOS 10
- UI/UX Improvement
- Small bug fixes
Fixed widget image setting bug.

- Fixed the problem with widget
(Please open the app once)
- iOS 10 Support

- Improved password lock
- Bug fix
- Crash fix

- Changed background image size to match 2015 theme. (Please setup the background again)
- iPhone X support
- Date Calculation redesign
- Many bug fixes
- Several Bug fixes

- New theme and design
- Add FaceID support

- Fixed crash
- New theme and design
- Add FaceID support
- Add the missing heart to the theme

- iOS 13 support
- When hiding the bottom bar in the "BeenTogether 2018 theme" state, the heart mark is also hidden.
- Russian and Ukrainian support
Several bug fixes
Several bug fixes
Several bug fixes
Several bug fixes
Several bug fixes
